tidbits.title: Maritime Legacy
tidbits.description: Portugal has a rich maritime legacy, with explorers like Vasco da Gama and a history of discoveries that influenced global navigation.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a diverse cultural heritage, seen in Fado music, historic landmarks like the Tower of Belém, and Azulejos art.

tidbits.title: Gastronomy and Wine
tidbits.description: Portugal is celebrated for its gastronomy, including pastéis de nata, and produces renowned wines like Port and Vinho Verde.
